pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, February 19, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with G7 leaders.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation. A media availability will follow.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand, will meet virtually with Canadian CEOs from different sectors of the economy to discuss vaccines, economic recovery, jobs, and a Team Canada approach to beating COVID-19.

Closed to media.
